name: The Fool
description: //artist: refrekans //the tarot deck consists of 22 major arcanas and 56 minor arcanas; it consists of 78 cards. the first card of the major arcana is The Fool. the number of this card is zero. the fool is the hero of this journey. in the collage, the difficulties that the hero must overcome are given by the painting Jan Brueghel The Elder â€“ The Tower of Babel.
